name: CreateSalesLead
description:
Create a new sales lead.

This tool creates a new sales lead in the system. It should be called when there's a need to register or track potential customer interest.

parameters.name: sales_lead_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing the sales lead information, including business info, contact details, source, and more. Required fields: business_info, email, first_name, last_name, phone, source. Optional fields: external_id, redirect_uri, state.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
